TopicTitle: Mobile processing plant and mining drill stay inactive

Articles.Content:
I have started n new game and now my processing plant and mining drill just stay inactive.

There is no options to start since or to start drilling.

Please help

Need more information.

Do you have electricity, will the drills deploy, are you using mods? Etc. etc. etc.

Does your drill rig and processing plant have a command module of some sort associated with it? Like a crewed control cabin or a probe core?

Because my first thought is "this sounds like a probe-driven craft that has run out of electricity." The drills and processing plant are really energy-hungry when active, they might have been draining your batteries faster than your setup could replenish them.

If the above suggestions don't work, pictures would help us out a lot. You can take a picture by pressing F1. The picture will be in the KSP/Screenshots folder. Upload to a place like imgur.com (you don't have to make an account), and post the link here.

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

-Claw

Thanks for the response. I will send a screen shot ASAP I do have mods but did work perfectly. I started a new game and now not working. Drill deploy and lots of electricity. There is a probe core on the drill. It is the exact same drill I used in previous game and did work fine. It is the same for the Mpp.
test the drill portion on the launch pad, you don't need to fly it to see if it is going to work
I seem not to be able to post IMG. Please i would live to solve my problem.

You'll have to upload the picture somewhere (like imgur.com). Imgur will let you drag the picture file from the folder directly into the web browser, then click Upload. After it uploads, copy the link from that page and paste it here.

Cheers,

-Claw

I hope this works. Here are screenshots

I have now tried to uninstall and reinstall all mods. i have tried a drill on kirban with no success.

Thanks for the help so far.
